item.description:
Grab your free ticket in this weeks issue of the Weekly Dig to the MVP - Most Valuable Patron Party at the Cask' n Flagon from 6 -8 pm on Thursday night.

Bring your ticket to the party. Fill out on line or at the party. www.casknflagon.com

Enter to win:

              FIRST PRIZE

MVP Award Most Valuable Patron, a 2011 (cut the line) Season Pass to the Cask 'n Flagon

4 tickets to a TBD Red Sox Weekend Game

$100.00 Cask n' Flagon Gift Card towards a Game Day Meal for 4

Cask 'n Flagon Merchandise for all 4 patrons

             SECOND PRIZE

Weekend 4 Pack to Red Sox Game TBD

             THIRD PRIZE

$100.00 Cask 'n Flagon Gift Card

$100.00 Cask 'n Flagon Merchandise

WINNER MUST BE PRESENT WITH TICKET TO CLAIM PRIZE

Everyone 21 plus is invited to the Awards Party..
item.how_to_find_us: RSVPs Coordinate by E Mail with other RSVPs
item.why: We all want a chance to win more Red Sox tickets!
item.name: Win Sox Tickets & More at The MVP - Most Valuable Patron Party at Cask n Flagon
